dollar.api.script

Interface SourceSegment


  • public interface SourceSegment

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      @NotNull String getCompleteSource()
      Returns the complete source code from which this segment comes.
      int getLength()
      The length of the segment.
      @NotNull String getShortHash()
      Gets a short hash code of the complete source.
      @NotNull String getShortSourceMessage()
      Returns a message describing the position in the source of this segment.
      @NotNull String getSourceFile()
      Returns the name of the source file from which the source originates.
      @NotNull String getSourceMessage()
      Returns a message describing the position in the source of this segment.
      @NotNull String getSourceSegment()
      Gets the source segment.
      int getStart()
      Get's the starting point in the getCompleteSource() of this source code segment.
